resources.string: Welcome to the Essteling games. Games that can be played after riding an attraction. If you want to play, press the start button and choose a character in the following screen. Afterwards you can begin playing an assortiment of minigames and compete with others in The Essteling. Good luck!

In the Droomreid attraction, the visitor goes on a journey through unknown worlds full of exotic plants and animals. You fly around in a zeppelin through the landscape, sometimes up, sometimes down, sometimes faster, sometimes harder, and you end up on a grass field in a beautiful gliding flight. All senses are addressed: feeling, seeing, hearing and smelling. That’s why this attraction is also very suitable for people with disabilities.
De Zwevende Belg is a combination of a walk area, a wattercoaster and a ‘darkride’ with boats. It’s located in the Stoerland part of the Essteling

Johan en de Eenhoorn is a wooden racing-rollercoaster, build around the legend of Saint Johan and the Unicorn. Is your rollercoaster ride faster than the opponent? Do you know how to overtake and catch the Unicorn? Experience it!
The Cobra is a classic rollercoaster which was once the first steal rollercoaster in the Essteling. It is still populair because of its speed and loopings
Show this QR-code to one of our employees to redeem your price!
